channel.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
channel.description:
I'm offering to make minecraft backgrounds for people.
Here is some of my work (note that I've improved since these were made, and quality is low for multiple reasons)
[url=http://th02.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2013/050/3/9/ridingpigtobattle_by_travas2-d5vkbhi.png]Image 1[/url] [url=http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2013/050/8/8/battlescene_by_travas2-d5vk38v.png]Image 2[/url]
Some credits to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=488724]Cole1497[/url] for ideas.
What I need is: -Size (px) -skin link -details of what you want -download of map if you want custom buildings, etc* -maybe some other details, depends.
[size=5pt]*optional[/size]
Try not to request outrageous things, such as enderdragons doing crazy shit.

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Oo, Can I get one of this http://www.minecraftskins.com/skin/351110/nicholas-flamel/

With his arms spread starting to cast a fireball on his right hand and wielding a lightening bolt on his left about to attack the enderdragon, like It’s the enderdragon on the left side of the screen (not flying, just getting ready to pounce) and my character on the other side?

if it sounds too hard then just my character riding a pig into lava

Rez: 1366x768

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Love it. Am I able to request that you make it a little darker? Seems like there is an awful lot of flare on the blocks

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

http://i.imgur.com/4g74GkV.jpg - preview

http://www.mediafire.com/?97cq1uhnn67du80 -Download for better quality

Do you like it, Phaze?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Travas:

I will work on that as soon as I get time. I might be able to do an avatar depending what size it needs to be, etc.

Avatar sizes are usually around 100x100 I believe (forum avatars anyway), anything around that size will be fine.

Notoriously I am known for being a hoarder on minecraft, do you think you would be able to fit that in with it? Maybe replacing it with anything involving mob fighting?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

kickingjamie:

Could you possibly make me a new skin? If I can think of something?

what about those old fashion coal miners with the hard hat, the lamp on top, and overalls, that would be pretty cool and it suits you very well lol

that’s a new version of what they wear

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

@Phaze One

I will work on that as soon as I get time. I might be able to do an avatar depending what size it needs to be, etc.

@kickingjamie

I do not make skins, sorry. Your best bet is to use a skin builder website, such as minecraft.novaskin.me or something like that. If you would like me to make a background for you with a skin you make, I’d be glad.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Could you possibly make me a new skin? If I can think of something?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Backgrounds
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I love this idea

  • Size: 1280 x 800
  • Skin: http://www.minecraftskins.com/skin/1423792/tron-player/
  • Details: Something related to caving and/or fighting mobs in the process
  • Download: -

Are you also able to do an avatar for me? Doesn’t need to be anything fancy just something neat that shows my character.

i owe you diamonds on the server for this

Read full topic
